name: Chronicles of the Cosmos
description:
Chronicles of the Cosmos is a 2.5D meditative, narrative-driven exploration game. The player controls Celeste, a wisp in search of understanding her place in the world. Celeste will travel around an island and collect fallen stars, remnants of a lost constellation which are all individually paired with a part of the constellations story. Her goal is to explore the wonderous island and collect these fallen stars and through the use of a lighthouse placed at the centre of the island, Celeste will recreate these constellations in an empty night sky and begin to learn elements of self-growth.

  • Take your time exploring a stunning island with multiple different environmental themed levels.
  • Learn the stories of how the island’s constellations were formed and what lessons they can pass on.
  • Recreate constellations and forge a dynamic night sky that will be viewable throughout your journey.
  • A relaxing and mystical soundtrack will be accompanying you at every step of your adventure.

Chronicles of the Cosmos is the result of the efforts of student game design team, AlphaGameSquad. We hope you enjoy!
